channel.title: Just installed whonix cant get Tor Browser
channel.description: Hello, I have just installed whonix and it doesnt have tor browser on it, so I installed firefox as per instructions but now I cant get anywhere with it because it always says Hmm we are having trouble finding that site.

item.title: Just installed whonix cant get Tor Browser
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Go to https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/XFCE see

For Whonix ™ VirtualBox import instructions, please press on expand on the right.

Press expand. See the screenshot instructions.

You need both VMs. Whonix-Gateway and Whonix-Workstation. Need to be running at the same time.

Read full topic
item.source: Just installed whonix cant get Tor Browser

item.title: Just installed whonix cant get Tor Browser
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Run whonixcheck on Whonix-Gateway.

Whonix – 13 Sep 19

Whonixcheck

Whonix ™ Security Check Application. Sanity Test. Leak Test. Update Check.

And as well as on Whonix-Workstation if success on Whonix-Gateway.

Read full topic

item.source: Just installed whonix cant get Tor Browser

item.title: Just installed whonix cant get Tor Browser
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Welcome to Whonix forums and thank you for your question!

What Whonix version did you download from and from which website? Whonix comes with Tor Browser installed by default in recent versions. Not installed by default sounds very wrong, perhaps a very old version from a website other than whonix.org?

Download from here: https://www.whonix.org/download/

Read full topic
